What are the symptoms of Febrile Ulceronecrotic Mucha-Habermann disease ?,"What are the signs and symptoms of febrile ulceronecrotic Mucha-Habermann disease? Initial symptoms of FUMHD include red scaly skin legions (papules) that ulcerate, breakdown, form open sores, then a red-brown crust
